description.value: Choose a Humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Paralyzed condition for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success

higher_level_description.value: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional humanoid for each slot level above 2nd
